start.text: Got a group coming our way.
We could do a lot of damage.

start_boss.text: I want to be a part of this.
Not my strong suit, but okay.
I think this is exactly what I've been waiting for.
I hope this isn't a mistake.

retreat.text: Let's get out of this first.
I'm going to stay. See if I can hold them off.

out_of_missiles.text: That's the last of the missiles.

engaged.text: You're gonna get what's coming to you.

hull_90.text: I don't know who you think you're kidding.

death.text: Heh... I knew you'd be the death of me.
So this is how it ends.

victory.text: All this was only ever going to play out one way.
Ha! If only it was this easy all the time.
I think our dealings are done here.
Ought to give the rest of them something to think about.
That was some kind of stunt we pulled.
The last thing you never see.
There was no choice in what I did.
There's no controlling war. No sense regretting what you can't stop.
They got what they had coming. Glad we were the ones to deliver it.
Thumbs down, you son of a bitch.
We got those bastards plenty good today.
Wish there were more of them. I wasn't done yet.

victory_boss.text: Huh. We made it through after all. Not sure what to make of that.
I guess I shouldn't be surprised.
It's a hell of a thing having someone with your ability looking out for me.
